property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the WordRTFImportPreference &#40;a Application).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: preserveLocalOverrides
property.shortdesc: If true, maintains character formatting in text whose formatting has been removed. Note: Valid when remove formatting is true.

property.name: importUnusedStyles
property.shortdesc: If true, imports unused styles.

property.name: resolveCharacterStyleClash
property.shortdesc: The option for handling style name conflicts.

property.name: resolveParagraphStyleClash
property.shortdesc: The option for resolving conflicts that arise when paragraph styles have matching names.

property.name: preserveGraphics
property.shortdesc: If true, preserves inline graphics.

property.name: preserveTrackChanges
property.shortdesc: If true, preserves comments and edits in the imported file.

property.name: importFootnotes
property.shortdesc: If true, imports footnotes.

property.name: importEndnotes
property.shortdesc: If true, imports endnotes.

property.name: useTypographersQuotes
property.shortdesc: If true, convert straight quotes and apostrophes in the imported text to typographic quotation marks and apostrophes.

property.name: convertPageBreaks
property.shortdesc: The option for handling manual page breaks.

property.name: importIndex
property.shortdesc: If true, imports the index.

property.name: importTOC
property.shortdesc: If true, imports the table of contents.

property.name: removeFormatting
property.shortdesc: If true, removes text and table formatting.

property.name: convertTablesTo
property.shortdesc: The policy for converting tables whose formatting has been removed. Note: Valid when remove formatting is true.

property.name: convertBulletsAndNumbersToText
property.shortdesc: If true, bullets and numbers will be converted to embedded characters during import. If false, bullets and numbers will be rendered by InDesign.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the WordRTFImportPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
